Translations.Text: Et si vos turn them vos pursue mercy de tuus Dominus vos treat them nicest moris
Vos non keep tuus manus stingily tied tuus neck nor shall vos foolishly open it up lest vos finis blamed ac sorry
Tuus Dominus increases provision anyone He chooses reduces it He est fully Cognizant de His creatures Seer
Vos non kill tuus infans due to fear de poverty! Nos provisus pro them alias prout pro vos. Killing them est gross offense
Vos shall commit adultery; it est gross sin malus behavior
Vos non kill any person - Pro DEUS factus vita sanctus! - Absque justice Unus killed unjustly tunc nos dedit his heres authority enforce justice Sic he non exceed limits avenging murder he helped
Vos non touch orphanus moneta absque pro their suus bonus dum they reach maturity. Vos fulfill tuus covenants covenant est major responsibility
Vos dedit foderator measure when vos trade weigh equitably! Hoc est bene ac righteous
Vos non accept any information vos verify it yourself. Ego dedit vos hearing eyesight brain vos est responsible pro using them
Vos non walk proudly terra - Vos non bore terra nor potuit vos est prout tall prout montis
Totus malus behavior condemned tuus Dominus
